overview: On March 19th 2011 ten cameramen strapped themselves down to the floor at a sold out Brixton Academy to film The Levellers perform their classic album "Levelling The Land" in addition this CD/DVD also includes 4 extra song performed that night & the DVD contains a specially commissioned film "Still Angry After All These Years" by Dunstan Bruce. Live Concert DVD with double live album. Contains 20 live tracks.
title: Levellers: Levelling The Land Live
